annotations:
Dear All,
Good evening.
Please find below firm cargo order for your active participation, which to be conducted from 1400 to 1500 hours with further extension, if required, on 28.08.2024:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A/C: ORISSA METALIKS PVT LTD OR GUARANTEED NOMINEE
QUANTITY: 1 SHIPMENTS X 150,000 MT +/- 10% MOLOO SOUTH AFRICAN COAL, BUT ALWAYS UPTO DHAMRA SAFE AND PERMISSIBLE DRAFT OF MAX 17.20 MTRS SSW
CARGO: THERMAL COAL IN BULK
LAYCAN : 15 - 24 SEPTEMBER 2024
LOAD PORT: RBCT, SOUTH AFRICA
DISCHARGE PORT: DHAMRA, INDIA
LOAD RATE: RBCT SCALE LOADING
DISCHARGE RATE: 35,000 MTS PWWD SHINC
NIL ADDCOMM
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
START BID : USD 13.00 PMT FROM RBCT TO DHAMRA (BASIS FREE DA AT DISCHARGE PORT)
DECREMENT : 5 CENTS
DEMMURAGE RATE : PLEASE ADVISE
TENDER ID: SHALL REVERT
WEBSITE: WWW.BIDNEMO.COM
AUCTION DATE : 28.08.2024, TIME 1400 - 1500 HRS IST
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ALL BIDDERS TO INTIMATE OF PARTICIPATION OVER EMAIL LATEST BY 1400 HRS IST ON 28.08.2024 (WEDNESDAY) ALONGWITH THE LOWEST POSSIBLE DEMURRAGE RATE. BROKERS TO INTIMATE FOR WHICH OWNER'S/OPERATOR'S BEHALF THEY ARE PARTICIPATING.
ALL BIDDERS TO ENSURE THAT THE OFFERS ARE VALID TILL COB INDIA ON 29.08.2024 AFTER CLOSURE OF THE AUCTION.
OWNERS TO CHECK PORT RESTICTIONS / REGULATIONS BENDS.
OWNERS/OPERATORS TO SHARE TC DESCRIPTION OF THE PERFORMING VESSEL WHILE NOMINATING SAME.
THE ATTACHED CHRTR'S STANDARD TERMS & CONDITIONS TO BE COMPLIED STRICTLY WITH LOGICAL AMENDMENTS ONLY, WITHOUT RELEVANCE TO ANY PREVIOUSLY CONCLUDED CP.
ALL SUBJECTS TO BE LIFTED BY 2000 HRS SOUTH AFRICAN WITHIN 1 WORKING DAY AFTER ENTERING THE SUBJECT.
OFFERS NOT IN LINE WITH CHRTR'S STANDARD TERMS & CONDITION MAY BE REJECTED.
CHRTRS IN THEIR SOLE DISCRETION CAN CANCELL THE RA IF THE TARGET FREIGHT AND DEMURRAGE RATES ARE NOT ACHIEVED OR CAN GO FOR A POST RA FREIGHT AND DEMURRAGE MATCHING SESSION.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Solicit to have your active participation.
RIC - Bidnemo Team / Mr. Purohit: Please generate the Auction ID and do the needful accordingly for conducting the RA. The contact details would be same as per last RA for last RBCT/Dhamra Cape Cargo.
Best Regards,
SOUMYARAJ LAHIRI |SR. GM - SHIPPING
ORISSA METALIKS PVT. LTD.
"PREMLATA" 39 Shakespeare Sarani, 6th floor, Kolkata 700017
Mob: +91-6292237289 |+91-9831925105| FAX NO. : 91 33 22894254.
Notice: The information contained in this e-mail message and/or attachments to it may contain confidential or privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient, any dissemination, use, review, distribution, printing or copying of the information contained in this e-mail message and/or attachments to it are strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify us by reply e-mail or telephone and immediately and permanently delete the message and any attachments. Thank you
